name: Temple Thieves - Game Jam Finals (Co-op)
description:
Our final game sprint as of Spring 2022 at Moorpark College in Game Technologies I by Johnathan Bair.

You are a pair of treasure hunters looking to find riches in a forgotten temple. Brave deadly traps and work together to reach the treasure room.

Move Characters

Player 1: W,A,S,D    Player 2: arrow keys

Players will respawn after a short duration and stick together the camera may leave you behind.

Credits:

Environment Artists: Gavin Camacho and Matthew Osorio

Programmers: Samuel Soltan and Brandon Z.

Level Designer and Character Artist: Samuel Soltan
